EmailTemplate.description: Bite The Ballot, TWITTER UK AND YOU!
EmailTemplate.name: Bite the Ballot
EmailTemplate.subject: Bite the Ballot, TWITTER UK & YOU!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hey {!Contact.FirstName},
Bite the Ballot and Twitter UK invite you for one night only to DeCafe with us! You may share your views online, but do you think you can talk abut these views with your communities?
This is going to be a fantastic evening to share your thoughts, your opinions, listen to others, challenge misconceptions, and explore solutions!
When Wednesday 16th of March from 18:00 - 19:30
Where Twitter UK 20 Air St, London W1B 5AG
Go to https://docs.google.com/a/the-challenge.org/forms/d/1qEQozvhDyPo4oEUarDn3k9D6fQsriT5SBa_EhJmkgtg/viewform to sign up
If you would like your travel costs reimbursed please ensure you bring a receipt.
Any questions please do ask!
Ola Awosika
Graduate Programme Associate Manager 07785 623395
